raw_body: IMBULDENIYA – NALINI KADIGAMUWA – Beloved wife of late Somisara Imbuldeniya,​ daughter of late Delicia Ratwatta and late L.B. Kadigamuwa,​ late sister Dulsy Imbuldeniya,​ late brothers – Duglas,​ Norman,​ Anton,​ Sydney,​ Gamini,​ Patrick Kadigamuwa,​ brother – Asoka,​ sister – Renee and Indrani,​ daughters – Anusha (Canada),​ Krishanthi,​ Nilmini and Niroshini,​ in-laws – Ananda (Canada),​ Thilak Wasantha and Hemantha,​ grandchildren – Dushan,​ Lasitha,​ Prabodha,​ Madhushani,​ Ishan,​ Rawindu,​ Deshini (Canada) and Kenneth (Canada),​ expired. Remains lie at Priyantha Florists Funeral Parlour,​ No. 190,​ Eriyagama,​ Peradeniya. Cremation on Wednesday,​ 04th October 2023 at 2.45 p.m at Arambegama Cemetery. 0773465348,​ 0774333142.062599
